{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3551510,"name":"Bill","username":"Hogsopleanty","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/h/8baadc/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-03-08T23:41:54.826Z","cooked":"

Hello this is my first post on this so I hope it’s in the correct area my team is a rookie and we just finished building our thrifty elevator and now we are on to the the programming part of it. Being the only mentor and having no experience or idea how to start programming a elevator I am hoping there some people out there that have some code that we could see and be able to work with any thing would be a amazing help

If this information helps we have it running on two Neos and spark maxe

Thanks for any help

PID Control for Thrifty Elevator Technical
Hello there, I am a mentor for team 9626, and we are trying to get the code finished for our 2 stage elevator. We were able to get the elevator to position (within 0.01") but the elevator couldn’t hold itself up so we started to increase kG to account for the weight due to gravity. When doing this, we now have an issue of the elevator jumping up 6 inches when enabling the robot, and when getting close to a position holds itself up but oscillates like crazy around that point. Is this just a tunin…

Also search Chief Delphi for elevator. There are several other threads you may find useful.
